koohiiStory1: He reminisced about his home country: "Ah, back in my home country, the bushes grew so high that they covered the city walls!".
koohiiStory2: It's easier if you think of the USA as the HOME COUNTRY. To the northern border you have it protected by BUSHES, while to south you have it protected by CITY WALLS (or a 800 mile long fence).
words: 連邦(れんぽう): commonwealth, federation of states
